LABEL: 0x31D
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x33B
STRING: My eyes are closed, and I can hear the waves.

LABEL: 0x365
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x383
STRING: Someone's voice resounds loudly in my ears from somewhere.

LABEL: 0x3A7
STRING: The sound of the waves fades into the distance.

LABEL: 0x42A
STRING: ――White.

LABEL: 0x440
STRING: When I open my eyes, I see a white room in front of me.

LABEL: 0x484
STRING: So white that it makes me realize how far removed from nature it is.

LABEL: 0x533
STRING: 「Are you alright?」

LABEL: 0x551
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x569
STRING: For a moment, I don't recognize the person talking to me because they blend in with the white background.

LABEL: 0x5A7
STRING: There's someone in a white coat sitting in front of me.

LABEL: 0x5DB
STRING: 「Are you alright?」

LABEL: 0x5FB
STRING: The person repeats their question.

LABEL: 0x615
STRING: Even though their lips are moving in front of my eyes,

LABEL: 0x645
STRING: their voice feels like it's echoing directly inside my ears.

LABEL: 0x677
STRING: I try putting a hand to my ear, and I'm surprised by the hard sensation I feel.

LABEL: 0x6B7
STRING: ――Oh, I see.

LABEL: 0x6D7
STRING: I'm wearing some sort of glasses at the moment.

LABEL: 0x707
STRING: I hold my right hand in front of my face.

LABEL: 0x733
STRING: I can see my own palm through the clear glass.

LABEL: 0x771
STRING: 「You can still back out of this. If you can't do this, just tell me.」

LABEL: 0x7BB
STRING: I wonder why.

LABEL: 0x7D9
STRING: I can't quite make out the face of the person in front of me.

LABEL: 0x80F
STRING: I can't make out who's speaking, even though I should be able to.

LABEL: 0x85B
STRING: Is it because of these smart glasses?

LABEL: 0x895
STRING: While I remain silent, "she" opens her mouth to say something.

LABEL: 0x8DF
STRING: 「...Just the fact that you agreed to come here is a step forward.」

LABEL: 0x925
STRING: The words "she" says are certainly true.

LABEL: 0x94F
STRING: Since the accident, I've hardly gone outside.

LABEL: 0x98B
STRING: And as for seeing people...

LABEL: 0x9B9
STRING: 「You still can't remember?」

LABEL: 0x9E3
STRING: I shake my head once to "her" question.

LABEL: 0xA81
STRING: 「I can't remember.」

LABEL: 0xAA1
STRING: 「What happened on that ship?」

LABEL: 0xACF
STRING: 「On that ship, the <SHEEP III>... I heard there were two survivors.」

LABEL: 0xB12
STRING: "She" takes out a small box.

LABEL: 0xB42
STRING: Well, maybe it's not even a box, as it has no opening.

LABEL: 0xB8C
STRING: A pitch-black cube.

LABEL: 0xBAA
STRING: The object is not only painted black but seems to absorb the light around it.

LABEL: 0xC08
STRING: The cube, which fits onto her palm, is held out to me.

LABEL: 0xCF4
STRING: 「Do you recognize what this is?」

LABEL: 0xD18
STRING: 「Everything that happened during those four days is recorded in this black box.」

LABEL: 0xD70
STRING: 「All that data is being transferred to the smart glasses you are wearing now. For example...」

LABEL: 0xE42
STRING: I felt no movement.

LABEL: 0xE74
STRING: But at the same time, like due to an invisible signal, a blue sea spreads out before me.

LABEL: 0xEBC
STRING: A blue sea shining under the sun.

LABEL: 0xEEA
STRING: It's an unreal and dizzying scene.

LABEL: 0xF12
STRING: However, this sea is familiar to me.

LABEL: 0xF48
STRING: I'm not sure, but isn't this...?

LABEL: 0x104E
STRING: I can hear the tide again. Waves are crashing inside my head.

LABEL: 0x1088
STRING: Is this an auditory hallucination?

LABEL: 0x10A4
STRING: Or a sensation created by the smart glasses?

LABEL: 0x10E4
STRING: 「I apologize for startling you.」

LABEL: 0x11AC
STRING: "Her" voice cuts off the waves, and the blue in front of me fades back to the original white room.

LABEL: 0x1206
STRING: 「What was that just now...」

LABEL: 0x1222
STRING: 「Kurama Bay, exactly how it was on the 1st of August, 2033.」

LABEL: 0x125E
STRING: The date "she" mentions makes me stop for a moment.

LABEL: 0x129A
STRING: It's a date I'll never forget.

LABEL: 0x12C8
STRING: Then... It's not just my imagination, after all.

LABEL: 0x12FE
STRING: I've seen that sea before.

LABEL: 0x132C
STRING: 「To be precise, we're using the data to rapidly calculate the "ifs" that could have existed in the past.」

LABEL: 0x138C
STRING: 「In other words, the past is trapped inside this box.」

LABEL: 0x13C2
STRING: "She" puts the small black box on the table.

LABEL: 0x13F4
STRING: 「Start over again once more, from August 2033. From here, you'll return to the past.」

LABEL: 0x1449
STRING: Finally, "she" reminds me of my purpose.

LABEL: 0x1485
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x149F
STRING: That's why I'm here in this room.

LABEL: 0x14D1
STRING: In this closed white space with no exit.

LABEL: 0x1501
STRING: Looking through these images.

LABEL: 0x151F
STRING: 「Tell me once more, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x154D
STRING: 「Why do you want to return to the past?」

LABEL: 0x1587
STRING: Why...

LABEL: 0x15A1
STRING: I'm still trying to piece together my hazy memories...

LABEL: 0x15DF
STRING: 「...I want to know.」

LABEL: 0x1603
STRING: 「Could they have gotten out of that sea alive?」

LABEL: 0x164D
STRING: 「If I had made different choices, would the result have been different?」

LABEL: 0x168D
STRING: 「That's what I want to know.」

LABEL: 0x16B5
STRING: The words come out by themselves.

LABEL: 0x16D9
STRING: Like I knew the answer all along...

LABEL: 0x170F
STRING: ...No, I do know.

LABEL: 0x173B
STRING: The words I speak make the memories, the will, clear.

LABEL: 0x1777
STRING: I'm here to redo my choices.

LABEL: 0x17AD
STRING: 「What you experience will be a simulation. The most realistic one you can think of.」

LABEL: 0x17FD
STRING: 「Listen, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x1823
STRING: 「You're the one who determines who survives.」

LABEL: 0x18BF
STRING: 「――Let's get started then, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x18ED
STRING: The noise blends with the clear glass.

LABEL: 0x191F
STRING: The white fades, and "her" voice becomes distant.

LABEL: 0x1951
STRING: 「First, when it all started.」

LABEL: 0x1971
STRING: 「It all began that day when no one could have predicted what would happen next.」

LABEL: 0x1A83
STRING: My vision is being enveloped in blue again.

LABEL: 0x1AAD
STRING: The ship slides out to the sea, unaware of what's to come.

LABEL: 0x1AE3
STRING: Out towards a sorrowful voyage.

LABEL: 0x1B0D
STRING: 「――August 1st, 2033.」
